result.title: Biodiversity monitoring: Final results
result.description: The report will merge the findings with regards to the floristic vegetation and zoological changes that are related with the development of the poplar stands in the SRC habitats Based on repeated plant species recordings in permanent sample plots and on periodical monitoring of birds amphibians and invertebrates the succession of the biocoenoses in selected stands will be outlined The occurrence of invasive species will be reported if such species are detected in the sample plots

result.title: Sustained Modelling and Scenario Building Reference Guide
result.description: A synoptic final report that encapsulates all achievements that were made during the implementation of the LEC work plans as well as the obstacles and oppositions that became evident This will particularly address the stakeholders positions and perspectives that are typically involved in and relevant for innovation in education notably in the formal sector teachers school heads teacher training and parents However all six LEC models are based on particular missions and a specific settings which are prototypical for the political social and economic context in which they are embedded In consequence an annotated guide for sustained modelling and scenario building will in synergy with the Advocacy Briefs and the Policy Briefs see WP7 provide a framework for the further exploitation of findings and their transfer into other specific models of innovative ecosystems of education with respect to regions topics and problem areas as well as economic sectors
